name: mini_assemble
description: Assemble fastq/fasta formatted reads and perform POA consensus.

options.description: reference fasta for reference-guided consensus (instead of de novo assembly)
number of minimap and racon threads (default: 1).
number of racon shuffles (default: 1. If not 1, should be >10).
trim adapters from reads prior to everything else.
error correct longest e% of reads prior to assembly, or an estimated coverage (e.g. 2x). For an estimated coverage, the -l option must be a fastx or a length (e.g. 4.8mb).
Reference length, either as a number (e.g. 4.8mb) or fastx from which length will be calculated.
